body: Any website to see all the chapters

Man, hopefully we'll get all these chapters translated into English one day, since from the drawings alone, I'm actually invested in what may be happening in the story.
Tho it hardly feels like ntr since the husband is barely in it, hell he doesn't even have a face here, so the cheating tag almost feels pointless, hahaha.
Don't tell me her husband was cheating on her. xD
